title: Animal Disease FarmData4All i4Trust
description: Object modelling an animal disease for a livestock farm.

type.description: Property. NGSI entity type. It has to be AnimalDisease

disease.description: Property. Animal disease. Indicates the disease the animal has as diagnosed by a veterinarian. Spanish source of diseases https://www.mapa.gob.es/es/ganaderia/temas/sanidad-animal-higiene-ganadera/sanidad-animal/enfermedades/

diagnosticTest.description: Property. Diagnostic test performed in the animals for the determination of the disease by a veterinarian.

date.description: Property. Date of diagnosis of the disease by a veterinarian.

veterinarianTreatment.description: Relationship. Medical treatment diagnosed by the veterinarian to treat the disease. https://github.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.Agrifood/blob/master/VeterinarianTreatment/schema.json

animals.description: Relationship. Animals or list of animals diagnosed with the disease. Model https://github.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.Agrifood/blob/master/Animal/schema.json

veterinarian.description: Relationship. Diagnostic veterinarian. Relationship to the prescribing veterinarian
